title: Such a land owner by registering himself as a Registered Developer, or through a Registered Developer may submit the scheme with the consent of 51% of the slum dwellers for the implementation of such scheme
clause_text: Such a land owner by registering himself as a Registered Developer, or through a Registered Developer may submit the scheme with the consent of 51% of the slum dwellers for the implementation of such scheme. The scheme so submitted shall forthwith be accepted by C.E.O. and C.E.O. will order preparation of the Eligibility List by the Competent Authority concerned.
